subject: Re: Spiricom foundation?
author: psi_research
full_text:
How is the chip being manipulated? I'm hearing the phrases but
there're kind of chilling-
-- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> 
> maybe this ship could als obe sued as a Spircom like device? This is
a sample out of a speech syth using the chip. Now I forget what site I
got it from --doh! I heard 'exhausts Free Speech' or 'lost free
speech' in this sample, and 'They grab(for)you' right at the
beginning, don't know if it means anything. I also heard "the(thee)
box". Maybe it's all auto suggestion-LOL?
>  
>  Frank-S
